content: **a free sample from the ocean buddies ebook** not ready for a full ocean of critters ocean buddies duos are the way to go inside you ll find a delightful pairing of adorable sea friends just enough to get your feet wet you ll also get links to the free ocean buddies video knitting mini-class * small project each animal uses just 20 yrds or less of worsted weight yarn * quick addictive knit each animal can be completed in less than an hour * instruction included take the free video knitting class and learn some new skills to expand your knitting prowess * instruction included take the free video knitting class and learn some new skills to expand your knitting prowess **skill level intermediate knitter** skills needed cast on bind off small diameter knitting in the round dpn or magic loop various increases and decreases **finished size ** animals vary but finished size is approximately 3″ long **gauge ** 6 stitches / 6 row = 1 inch **yarn ** small amounts of worsted weight yarn each animal uses 20 yrds or less suggested twice sheared sheep mini palate 100 yrds per palate twice sheared sheep cotton worsted 200 yrds per skein twice sheared sheep worsted wool 200 yrds per skein **needles ** size 5 **additional materials ** 6mm plastic safety eyes fiber fill stuffing yarn needle
